name: Mystic Realm
description:
The most-anticipated MMORPG of 2020, “Mystic Realm” is coming! Produced with a state-of-the-art engine, this game features precisely-calculated movements, flamboyant skills and free-to-match talents that are going to give you a combat experience like never before. Come and immerse yourself in this lifelike mythical world and experience an unimaginable storyline with us!


[Free Talent Matching- Battlefield at Your Fingertips]
By constantly going past your limits, you can unlock more and more talents as well as skills in the game. Mix and match the talents freely to draw up your very own combat strategy so you can fight in your own style!

[Enormous Mythical Realm- Breathtaking Scenery]
This game most definitely has a grand world map. In this world, you can enjoy the gorgeous sceneries of the fairylands, a quiet lake, snow mountains and a lively city.

[Social Interaction- Find Your Friends and Your Love]
Through various interactive systems in the game like having a personal album, photo wall as well as a mall, you can become acquaintances with players from all over the world and get married to your loved one right here. 'Tis the season to fall in love!

[Multiplayer Combat- Exciting Gameplays]
This game has a fair number of well-designed gameplays like Sword Valley, Guild Defense, Ninth Heaven Duel, Three Realm Flag and others. Explore it by yourself!

[Variety of Costumes- Dazzling Appearance]
You can equip any mount, costume, wings, pet and artifacts to your liking! Be it a fashion model or a celestial deity, there’s always one to fit you and your sense of style! Collect them all now, and don't hesitate to strut your stuff!
 
Mystic Realm Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/EyouMysticRealm/
Contact Us: mysticrealm.eyougame.com
Support mail: support@eyougame.com
